text: BSP chief Mayawati extended full support to the reservation demand by the Jat community and said the State government should consider it sympathetically and implement it immediately. She alleged that the ruling BJP in Haryana was following in the footsteps of the previous Congress government, forcing the Jat community to launch an agitation demanding their inclusion among the Other Backward Class. Criticising the use of force and firing, Ms. Mayawati said, there was extreme resentment in the community. — PTI
title: BSP backs stir
